REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f4045 reute b f BC-JAPAN-TO-RELEASE-GNP 03-17 0056

TEXT.TITLE: JAPAN TO RELEASE GNP FIGURES LATER TODAY
TEXT.BODY: The Economic Planning Agency will announce gross national product (GNP) figures for the October/December quarter today at 1700 hrs local time (0800 gmt), Agency officials told Reuters. In the July/September quarter, GNP rose 0.6 pct from the previous three months. REUTER
